title: LOKSamarth
contactUsDescription: We'd love to hear from you. Please fill out the form below or reach out to us through other channels.
messagePlaceholder: Let us know how we can help...
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have questions? We've got answers. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact us.
faq.a1: LOKSamarth is a comprehensive platform designed to empower Self-Help Groups (SHGs) by digitizing their records, activities, and financial transactions. It aims to centralize data, improve transparency, and facilitate easier access to government schemes and financial support for sustainable livelihoods.
faq.q2: Who can use the LOKSamarth platform?
faq.a2: The platform is primarily for members of Self-Help Groups (SHGs), Village Organisations (VOs), and Cluster Level Federations (CLFs). It also serves government officials and administrators who manage and monitor the National Rural Livelihoods Mission (NRLM).
faq.q3: How does LOKSamarth help in getting financial assistance?
faq.a3: By maintaining a digital, transparent record of an SHG's savings, meetings, and financial health, LOKSamarth makes it easier for banks and government agencies to assess creditworthiness. This streamlines the process of applying for and receiving loans, grants, and other forms of financial aid.
faq.q4: Is my data secure on the LOKSamarth platform?
faq.a4: Yes, data security is a top priority. The platform uses robust security measures, including encryption and access controls, to ensure that all personal and financial information of SHG members is kept safe and confidential.
empoweringText: Empowering rural communities through technology and financial inclusion.
mission.title: LOKSamarth Mission
mission.subtitle: Enhancing Rural Livelihoods
mission.p1: LOKSamarth plays a crucial role in realizing NRLM's vision of empowering Self-Help Groups through digitization.
mission.p2: The application is designed to record member profiles and activities at every Community-Based Organization (CBO) nationwide.
mission.p3: Through LOKSamarth, the government can maximize returns on SHG savings and easily provide financial assistance for sustainable livelihood development at the grassroots level.
